directions: Combine chicken meat, chicken broth, beef broth, tomatoes, onion, green chiles, oil, cumin, garlic, and chili powder together in a stockpot; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until flavors have blended, at least 1 hour. Add tortillas just before serving.
ingredients: 1 whole whole cooked chicken, de-boned and meat cubed
1 pinch chili powder, or to taste
1 (6 inch) corn tortillas, torn, or more to taste
title: Aunt Kathy's Tortilla Soup
